Name: Mohammed Shami
Teams: Kolkata Knight Riders, India A, Bengal, India, Rest of India, Board Presidents XI, East Zone, Indians, Delhi Capitals, Mohun Bagan, World XI, Punjab Kings, Asia XI
Bio: Mohammed Shami was India's leading fast bowler in the 2015 World Cup in Australia,when the team marched into the semi-finals  picked up 77 out of 80 wickets on offer,It was later revealed that he had played through that entire tournament -  the preceding Test series against the hosts,essentially four months - through a knee injury,His success can be attributed to his pace,accuracy  primarily his skill in moving the ball - both old  new
